translation: Through the grace of Vyasa, I have heard this supreme and most secret Yoga, directly from Krishna, the Lord of Yoga, Himself declaring it.
commentary: 18.75 Vyasaprasadaat through the grace of Vyasa? heard have heard? This this? Guhyam secret? I'm I? The supreme? Yoga Yoga? from the Lord of Yoga? from Krishna from Krishna? directly directly? Saying declaring? Svayam Himself.Commentary Through the grace of Vyasa By obtaining the divine eye from him.Yoga This dialogue between Krishna and Arjuna? I have heard it directly from Him. This dialogue is called Yoga because it treats of Yoga and leads to the attainment of union with the Lord.
